metadata.name: condescending w0nka
metadata.description:
Welcome to the claim page for our ERC-1155 NFT collection, Hand Painted memes. We're excited to offer you the opportunity to own a unique piece of digital art: an acrylic painting on canvas of the popular meme "condescending wonka".

This NFT is more than just a digital file - it is backed by a 1 of 1, original painting, that you can proudly display and own forever should you participate until the final raffle.*  This painting, and those which follow, have been carefully crafted by our talented artist, and verified on the Ethereum blockchain to ensure their authenticity and ownership.

*Hand Painted Memes is a collection of 8 digital art pieces, each representing an original 1 of 1 hand painted canvas.  To participate in the second drop of the collection, the collector must hold a minimum of 2 tokens from the prior drop.  As the drops progress the scarcity will begin to become more relevant, until the final drop.  
Holders of the final drop will have the option to participate in a raffle to receive the 8 physical paintings to display as the ultimate meme painting collection.
